mapper.select: SELECT /* kr.co.wisenut.mapper.DictionaryMapper.getSharedDictionaryId */ COALESCE(DICTIONARY_ID, 0) AS "dictionaryId" FROM WISETM_DICTIONARIES WHERE DICTIONARY_TYPE = #{dictionaryType} AND DICTIONARY_SHARED_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* kr.co.wisenut.mapper.DictionaryMapper.getDictionaryNames */ * FROM ( SELECT WTD.DICTIONARY_ID AS "dictionaryId" , WTD.DICTIONARY_NAME AS "dictionaryName" , WTD.DICTIONARY_TYPE AS "dictionaryType" , WTD.DICTIONARY_DESC AS "dictionaryDesc" , WTD.DICTIONARY_SHARED_YN AS "dictionarySharedYn" , WTD.DICTIONARY_OWNER AS "dictionaryOwner" , WTE.CNT AS "dictionaryEntryCnt" FROM WISETM_DICTIONARIES WTD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DICTIONARY_ID , COUNT(*) AS "CNT" FROM WISETM_ENTRIES GROUP BY DICTIONARY_ID ) WTE ON WTD.DICTIONARY_ID = WTE.DICTIONARY_ID ) WTD WHERE 1 = 1 /* AND dictionaryEntryCnt > 0 */
AND DICTIONARY_OWNER = #{dictionaryOwner}

SELECT /* kr.co.wisenut.mapper.DictionaryMapper.getDictionaryDetail */ DICTIONARY_ID AS "dictionaryId" , DICTIONARY_NAME AS "dictionaryName" , DICTIONARY_TYPE AS "dictionaryType" , DICTIONARY_DESC AS "dictionaryDesc" , DICTIONARY_SHARED_YN AS "dictionarySharedYn" , DICTIONARY_OWNER AS "dictionaryOwner" , TO_CHAR(CRE_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS "creDt" FROM WISETM_DICTIONARIES WHERE DICTIONARY_ID = #{dictionaryId}
AND DICTIONARY_OWNER = #{dictionaryOwner}
mapper.sql: ( SELECT TMP.* , CEIL( TMP.SEQ / #{pageSize} ) AS PAGE_ROW FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ , WTD.DICTIONARY_ID , WTD.DICTIONARY_NAME , WTD.DICTIONARY_TYPE , WTD.DICTIONARY_DESC , WTD.DICTIONARY_SHARED_YN , WTD.DICTIONARY_OWNER , COALESCE(WTE.CNT, 0) AS "CNT" , WTD.CRE_DT , WTD.CRE_USER , WTD.MOD_DT , WTD.MOD_USER FROM WISETM_DICTIONARIES WTD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DICTIONARY_ID , COUNT(*) AS "CNT" FROM WISETM_ENTRIES GROUP BY DICTIONARY_ID ) WTE ON WTD.DICTIONARY_ID = WTE.DICTIONARY_ID ORDER BY WTD.DICTIONARY_ID DESC ) TMP ) TOTAL
